enabled.description: Whether the channel is enabled or disabled. By default, it is set to `true`.

promotionalMessagesPerSecond.description: Maximum number of promotional messages that can be sent per second.

senderId.description: Identifier of the sender for your messages.

shortCode.description: Short Code registered with the phone provider.

transactionalMessagesPerSecond.description: Maximum number of transactional messages per second that can be sent.

shortCode.description: Short Code registered with the phone provider.
